_header: The high feast of Gods blood that late was I-found
Subjects: Corpus Christi, feast of; transubstantiation; Eucharist
_description: Feast of Corpus Christi, in some MSS of the South English Legendary — 268 lines

Bod779.First Lines:
Þe hyȝe feste of goddes blood þat late was I
                    foundegood is to honoure In euery a stounde…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& god leue þat we moot þer to vs clensy
                    soþat we mowe þer þorwȝ be sauid fro pyne & fro
                    wo
Bod779.Note:
Three and a half pages blank following this
                    (175-176v).
Bod779.Attributed Title: Þe feste of corpus day cristy (f. 172v)
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 307.

BLEge2810.First Lines: Þe heȝe feste of godis blode þat late was ifundegode is to honouren in eueriche stounde…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …& god lene þat we mote þer to us clansi soþat we mowe þer þorȝ be ssilde uram pine & uram wo
